history.proof: intros m k z Hmap Hexd Hnotsucc Hnotpred. split. - unfold cA. unfold exd in Hexd. shelve. - unfold cA_1. unfold exd in Hexd. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim z : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Hexd : (fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \\/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end) m z Hnotsucc : ~ succ m k z Hnotpred : ~ pred m k z Unable to unify "z" with "(fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_1 m0 k z else cA_1 m0 k z end for cA) m k z".

exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim z : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Hexd : (fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \\/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end) m z Hnotsucc : ~ succ m k z Hnotpred : ~ pred m k z Unable to unify "z" with "(fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_1 m0 k z else cA_1 m0 k z end for cA_1) m k z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k
pred = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A_1 m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
not_exd_A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA m k z) -> exd m z
exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA m k z)
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> A m k nil = nil
A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> A_1 m k nil = nil
succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
not_exd_nil : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m nil
BinIntDef.Z.abs = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos p | Z.neg p => Z.pos p end : Z -> Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
IZR = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => R0 | Z.pos n => IPR n | Z.neg n => (- IPR n)%R end : Z -> R Argument scope is [Z_scope]
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
A_1 = fix A_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inj_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (succ m k) (A m k)
inj_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (pred m k) (A_1 m k)
inj_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k)
inj_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cA m k)
B_1 = fix B_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B_1 m0 k y) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then m0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap

```    
intros m k z Hmap Hexd Hnotsucc Hnotpred.
split.
- unfold cA. simpl.
  destruct (exd m z) eqn:Hexd_z.
  + unfold exd in Hexd. rewrite Hexd_z in Hexd. contradiction.
  + reflexivity.
- unfold cA_1. simpl.
  destruct (exd m z) eqn:Hexd_z.
  + unfold exd in Hexd. rewrite Hexd_z in Hexd. contradiction.
  + reflexivity.
```

original: intros m k z Hmap Hexd Hnotsucc Hnotpred. split. - unfold cA. simpl. destruct (exd m z) eqn:Hexd_z. + unfold exd in Hexd. rewrite Hexd_z in Hexd. contradiction. + reflexivity. - unfold cA_1. simpl. destruct (exd m z) eqn:Hexd_z. + unfold exd in Hexd. rewrite Hexd_z in Hexd. contradiction. + reflexivity.
